sentence: I am not a fan of the Art Deco refurbishing
In my opinion the rooms in both the St Regis and the W could use a bit of a refresh

The W Washington is a conversion of a grand old Washington hotel redecorated in the iconic trendy W style interestingly although the room and furnishings are crisp and do not show inappropriate wear the trendy decor seems somehow dated
but we heard they are going to renovate and change the rooms to make them more spacious
The hotel is an old hotel which I have visited before the W hotels brand purchased it and renovated it fitness center was not large but it was sufficient
Rooms were modernized but extremely small

Also the elevators were so busy taking drinkers up to their roof bar that they took myself amd my wife in her white wedding dress through the filthy dirty kitchen floor and cargo area to a maintenance elevator
When I arrived the hotel was undergoing severe renovations
We were there while the hotel was undergoing extensive renovations Dec 2018 but we were not bothered at all by the work
The rooftop bar was closed for renovation during our stay but I think that is why we got our rooms for cheaper than normal
By the way the renovations of the rooms the Rooftop to the new Cherry Restaurant and Beer cellar have all been worth the wait
Rooms are awesome now huge improvement over pre reno
The renovated room was stunning and the shower stood out as strong and nice
The property is newly renovated and the spaces are quite nice
I had call the decor W 20 meaning newly updated and modern
The rooms were amazing and the overall hotel remodel refurbishment exquisite
The Extreme WOW suite was beautiful before but after the recent renovations I am absolutely in LOVE with the new sleek modern look of the suite
The W Awesome hotel you can tell it was recently renovated
Amazing upgrade to newly renovated suite for Bonvoy elite status
Amazing service and the remodel is stunning
